title: Am I a K-pop stan even if I like only one group? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Yes, you are a kpop stan even if you like one group. You sound like a new kpop stan to me. If you are, then don’t worry, you will soon discover other groups and maybe stan them. As long as you love a kpop group, the members and their music, you are considered as a stan. If you love their music specifically and not the members, then you will be considered as a casual fan. TTFN

Technically you are because that one kpop group does produce K-pop, but other kpop stans wouldn't consider you a kpop stan because to be a kpop stan you have to like other korean music under the category of kpop, not just music from one kpop artist.
Hi I could say you are because even I stan only one group that is BTS so don’t worry if you like one group it means you like their music too so you are a K-pop stan .
